item.title: LCID
item.description: score:186 Chances: Lucid Group has reduced the starting price of its Air sedan by 10%, making it a more attractive option for consumers looking to buy or lease an EV. The company’s Lucid Air has been awarded as America’s most awarded new luxury vehicle and has been selected to Car and Driver’s 10Best list for 2024, indicating a strong consumer appeal.
